name: Hill Climb Racing + gamemaker source
description:
unlock and upgrade strange vehicles ,climb mounts  in defferent areas .

plus lots more!

superb 2d  physics racer that is much like Hill climb racing on android this game is the same but in 1920x1080 full HD resolution you dont need bluestacks or any emulator to play it . and this provide the same experiance in HD

unlock and play with different vehicles and stages. there are tons of them and new features add every week . so ... never forget  to check for updates !

NEW UPDATE! may 2020 

> added 5 more vehicles and stages each

>GUI improvements

>bug fixes
